authors.author: Fanny J. Crosby William H. Doane

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Savior, Savior, hear my humble cry. newline While on others Thou art calling, newline Do not pass me by.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Pass me not, O gentle Savior; newline Hear my humble cry. newline While on others Thou art calling, newline Do not pass me by.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Let me at Thy throne of mercy newline Find a sweet relief; newline Kneeling there in deep contrition, newline Help my unbelief.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Trusting only in Thy merit, newline Would I seek Thy face. newline Heal my wounded, broken spirit. newline Save me by Thy grace.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thou, the Spring of all my comfort, newline More than life to me, newline Whom have I on earth beside Thee? newline Whom in heaven but Thee?
